speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Sarah Johnson?

speaker: Customer
text: No, this is not Sarah. I think you have the wrong number.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the mix-up. I'm calling about an outstanding balance on your account with City Bank.

speaker: Customer
text: I really have no idea what you're talking about. I don’t have an account with City Bank.

speaker: Agent
text: I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Let me double-check the number I dialed.

speaker: Customer
text: Please do that. I’d like to resolve this quickly.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your patience. Looks like I need to update my records. You won’t be contacted again.

speaker: Customer
text: Thanks for confirming that. Have a good day.
